title: Bath Sounds
content: We are very proud to be broadcasting @bath.pride live from 11am-4pm this Saturday! 🌈 🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️ the team will be interviewing people on the March and at Sydney Gardens and expect plenty of pride anthems
Tune in online at www.Bathsound.radio or ask your smart speaker 🔊 to 'play bath sound radio'
